participant_2.background:
I'm not sure what the most difficult thing I've ever done is, but I've always found it hard to balance my academic and personal life.
my favorite auto is a bentley.
I've had to protect myself from bullies, but I'm not a fighter by nature.
I drive a classic car because it reminds me of my family's history.
i am a genius and know over 300 languages.

content.text: Good! I'm in the mood to talk about cars and motorcycles.
Sounds good, what kind of car do you drive?
I drive a classic car because it reminds me of my family's history.
That's really cool. I wish I had a classic car. I've always wanted to ride a motorcycle.
I rode my motorcycle across the country a few years ago. It was an amazing experience.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to do that. What was the most difficult part of the trip?
I think the most difficult part was dealing with the weather. It was raining a lot of the time.
I can imagine. I've been caught in the rain on my bike before and it's not fun.
Yeah, it was pretty miserable. But overall, it was a great experience.
I'm glad to hear that. It sounds like you had a lot of fun.
Yeah, I did. I'd definitely recommend it to anyone who's thinking about doing it.
Thanks for the advice. I'll definitely keep it in mind.
